fullText: The jukebox musical 'The Heart of Rock & Roll,' built around the hits of Huey Lewis and the News, is energetic and well-performed but feels more like a concert than a cohesive story.
dtliExcerpt: The jukebox musical 'The Heart of Rock & Roll,' built around the hits of Huey Lewis and the News, is energetic and well-performed but feels more like a concert than a cohesive story.
